lines.text: Beautiful day outside, isn't it? Nothing like good old southern California for lots of sunshine!
I mean I'd rather be dead than living the way I've been living. Do you understand that?

That's the only thing that distinguishes us between any other species of animal, Carla - I care about you! Carla, don't close yourself off now. It's real important, real important that you maintain contact with at least one person that really cares about you.
I don't know what you're saying.
I'll tell you what I am saying! That you and I can make that contact.

[softly]
I don't want to make that contact.

All right. All right, bastard. I've finished running. So do what you want. Take your time - buddy. Take your time. Really, I'm thankful for the, uh... rest. I'm so... tired of being scared. So it's all right, it really is, it's all right. You can, uh, do anything you want to me, you can, uh, torture me, kill me, anything. But you can't have me. You cannot touch me.
